'If you are willing to assist us in our efforts to craft hard tack, then I shall teach you the recipes necessary for our endeavour here.\n\n'Speak with me again and I will explain.'
Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall: Recipes
Crafting the hard tack used by dwarf explorers is a community effort. To participate in the event you need to learn three recipes. Fortunately, these are easily learned.

'There are three distinct recipes we craft in support of making hard tack.

'The first is a brew to slake the thirst of all participants that helps to focus and speed along the difficult task of mining the ever-burning ore.

'The second is a snack that puts a spring in your step and gives you extra speed as you traverse the Great Vault.

'The last recipe is a dish that provides strength when lifting and hauling heavy objects.

'Learn these recipes.'
